languages.text: "Я больше не желаю обманывать себя смертной надеждой — даже она умерла. Всем нам достаются разные судьбы — чья-то легка, чья-то полна скорбей. Мне досталась такая, и я не буду скулить, точно щенок, отрицая ее. Пропащим мне суждено быть от роду, но только сейчас я обрел смелость принять сей путь".

"I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."
languages.original_text: "Я больше не желаю обманывать себя смертной надеждой — даже она умерла. Всем нам достаются разные судьбы — чья-то легка, чья-то полна скорбей. Мне досталась такая, и я не буду скулить, точно щенок, отрицая ее. Пропащим мне суждено быть от роду, но только сейчас я обрел смелость принять сей путь".

traits.locale_text: "I no longer want to deceive myself with mortal hope — even that has died now. Each to his own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, and I will not whimper like a pup, denying it. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

"I no longer want to deceive myself with mortal hope — even that has died now. Each to his own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, and I will not whimper like a pup, denying it. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

"I no longer want to deceive myself with mortal hope — even that has died now. Each to his own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, and I will not whimper like a pup, denying it. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

"I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

languages.text: «Ya no quiero engañarme más con esperanzas vanas. Cada uno tiene su propio destino. Para algunos es algo fácil y para otros es algo pesaroso. El mío es de los segundos, supongo. Estar siempre perdido ha sido mi destino desde que nací, pero solo ahora tengo el valor de aceptarlo».
languages.original_text: "I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

traits.locale_text: «Ya no quiero engañarme más con la esperanza de los mortales. Hasta eso ha muerto. Cada uno afronta su propio destino. Para algunos es algo fácil y para otros es algo pesaroso. El mío es de los segundos y no lloriquearé como un cachorro intentando negarlo. Estar siempre perdido ha sido mi destino desde que nací, pero solo ahora tengo el valor de aceptarlo».

languages.text: “如今，我不想再用那虚幻的希望欺骗自己了。我们每个人都有自己的命运。对某些人而言，命运充满了甜蜜，而对另一些人而言，则充满了哀痛。我猜，我就属于后者吧。永远迷失便是我与生俱来的命运，但直到现在，我才鼓起勇气接受它。”
languages.original_text: "I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

traits.locale_text: “如今连那虚幻的希望也已经破灭了，我不想再欺骗自己了。每个人都有自己的命运。对某些人而言，命运充满了甜蜜，而对另一些人而言，则充满了哀。我属于后者，我不打算像小狗一样呜咽着，否认我的命运。永远迷失便是我与生俱来的命运，但直到现在，我才鼓起勇气接受它。”

languages.text: 「もう偽りの希望で自分を欺きはしない。みんなそれぞれの定めがある。難しくない定めの者もいれば、悲しみばかりの定めの者もいる。俺はきっと後者だ。生まれながら、ずっと道に迷う定めなんだ。だが、今になってやっと、その道を受け入れる勇気が出たよ」
languages.original_text: "I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はもう儚い希望なんかで自分を欺いたりしない。その希望さえも今やついえてしまった。それぞれが自分の運命にある。単純な運命にある者もあれば、悲しみに満ちた運命にある者もある。俺の希望は後者だが、子犬のようにそれを泣きながら拒絶したりはしない。永遠に道に迷うことは生まれながらの運命。だが今になってようやく、その道を受け入れる勇気を見つけることができた」

languages.text: « Plus jamais je ne céderai aux illusions nées de faux espoirs. À chacun son destin. Pour certains, la route est facile ; pour d'autres, elle est pavée de malheur. La mienne appartient à la seconde catégorie, semble-t-il. Je suis voué depuis ma naissance à suivre la voie de la perdition, mais ce n'est que maintenant que j'ai enfin trouvé le courage de l'accepter. »
languages.original_text: "I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

traits.locale_text: « Plus jamais je ne céderai aux illusions nées de l'espoir propre aux mortels... Ça aussi, c'est fini, à présent. À chacun son destin. Pour certains, la route est facile ; pour d'autres, elle est pavée de malheur. La mienne appartient à la seconde catégorie, et je ne vais pas pleurnicher sur mon sort en cherchant à me voiler la face. Je suis voué depuis ma naissance à suivre la voie de la perdition, mais ce n'est que maintenant que j'ai enfin trouvé le courage de l'accepter. »

languages.text: "Ich will mich nicht länger selbst durch falsche Hoffnung täuschen. Jeder von uns hat sein eigenes Schicksal. Manche ein leichtes. Andere eines voll Trauer. Meines gehört wohl eher zur letzteren Sorte. Stets verloren zu sein, war von Geburt an mein Schicksal, doch erst jetzt habe ich die Nerven gefunden, diesen Pfad zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will mich nicht länger durch sterbliche Hoffnung täuschen — selbst die ist jetzt gestorben. Jeder hat sein eigenes Schicksal. Manche ein leichtes. Andere eines voll Trauer. So auch ich, und ich werde nicht winseln wie ein Welpe und es leugnen. Stets verloren zu sein, war von Geburt an mein Schicksal, doch erst jetzt habe ich die Nerven gefunden, diesen Pfad zu akzeptieren."

languages.original_text: "I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

languages.text: "Artık kendimi boş umutlarla kandırmak istemiyorum. Hepimizin bir kaderi var. Bazıları kolay bir hayat yaşarken diğerlerinin gözyaşı dinmiyor. Benimki ikinci türden sanırım. Yolumu hiç bulamamak benim kaderim. Fakat artık bu kaderi kabullenecek cesaretim var."
languages.original_text: "I no longer want to deceive myself with false hope. Each of us has our own fate. For some, it is an easy one; for others, one full of sorrow. Mine is of the second kind, I think. To be ever lost has been my fate from birth, but only now have I found the nerve to accept that path."

traits.locale_text: "Artık kendimi boş umutlarla kandırmak istemiyorum. Hepimizin bir kaderi var. Bazıları kolay bir hayat yaşarken diğerlerinin gözyaşı dinmiyor. Benimki ikinci türden sanırım. Yolumu hiç bulamamak benim kaderim. Fakat artık bu kaderi kabullenecek cesaretim var."
